Description.Text: There are 2 fully equipped and furnished apartments with 2 twin bedrooms, bathroom, air-conditioner, fully equipped kitchen & 7 open plan equipped and furnished studios with kitchenette at the entrance, 2 single beds in the sleeping area, bathroom and air-conditioner.
Hotel is situated 22km from Corfu Town, 21km from the airport, 23km from the port, 4km from Liapades village, 30m main road, 100m bus station, 2km farmacy, 100m super market, 100m restaurants.
